name: imprime-etiquetas
description: Software desktop que tem como objetivo imprimir etiquetas de diversos tipos e tamanhos

scripts.build: rmdir dist /S /Q 2>nul & tsc && mkdir dist\dist && xcopy src\public dist\public /E /I /H && xcopy src\resources dist\resources /E /I /H && xcopy src\.dist dist /E /I /H && copy src\config.json dist\config.json /Y && npx terser dist/core/Application.js -o dist/core/Application.js --compress drop_console,drop_debugger,unused,collapse_vars,sequences,reduce_funcs,toplevel --mangle --toplevel --comments false && npx terser dist/main.js -o dist/main.js --compress drop_console,drop_debugger,unused,collapse_vars,sequences,reduce_funcs,toplevel --mangle --toplevel --comments false
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && cd dist && npm install && npm run build:prod && npm run config:prod && npm run clean-dist

author: Daniel Rodrigues de Vargas
